mapper.sql: profit_item_set_id AS profitItemSetId, business_type_id AS businessTypeId, item_name AS itemName, item_type AS itemType, item_min_level AS itemMinLevel, item_max_level AS itemMaxLevel, update_user_id AS updateUserId, update_time AS updateTime
mapper.select:
select item.item_name,item.item_mine_level as itemMinLevel,item_max_leve as itemMaxLevel,fee.fee_name,fee.fee_level as feeLevel
from tb_profit_item_set item join tb_profit_fee_set fee on item.profit_item_set_id=fee.profit_item_set_id
where item.item_type= and fee.fee_id
